posts.post_content:
1. Caruthers Browns Champ-rebacked but looks EX------$250
2. Comiskey-Browns Champ--EX front with some scrapbook paper adhering to the back-----1750
3. Barnes Manager--Really sharp image, vertical crease-----$750
4. 1890 Bassett NY--rare 1890 team change--VG------$2500
5. 1890 Hornung NY---a second rare 1890 team change--VG appearance but pinhole at top---$2500
6. Joe Miller-Minneapolis---rare card, bending over to field, slight paper loss LR but otherwise nice----$3500
7. Silver Flint Portrait---VG----$750
8. Tommy McCarthy sliding, indoor background, gem front, scrapbook residue on back--$750
8. Serad-Toronto---two creases but nice appearance one-the-less----$550

Many other cards available to team collectors. iPhone images are available for all cards. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

Thanks---Jay
